sentences.sContent: In  Figure 2, each arrowhead represents an interface.
sentences.sCn: 在  图2中，每个箭头表示一个接口。

sentences.sContent: The ranger inspected it as he might an arrowhead or spear point.
sentences.sCn: 护林员像研究一个箭头或者矛尖一样研究着它。

sentences.sContent: They had rummaged around his thorax, trying to get close to the arrowhead and the tissue around it.
sentences.sCn: 他们对他的胸腔周围进行了仔细的检查，试图靠近箭头及其周围的骨组织。

trans.tranOther: the sharp pointed end of an arrow
